description:
'''Yoann Lemoine''' ({{IPA|fr|jɔan ləmwan}}; born 16 March 1983), known professionally as '''Woodkid''', is a French [[music video director]], [[graphic designer]] and singer-[[songwriter]]. His most notable works include his music video direction for [[Katy Perry]]'s "[[Teenage Dream (Katy Perry song)|Teenage Dream]]", [[Taylor Swift]]'s "[[Back to December]]", [[Drake (musician)|Drake]]'s "[[Take Care (song)|Take Care]]", [[Lana Del Rey]]'s "[[Born to Die (song)|Born to Die]]" and [[Harry Styles]]'s "[[Sign of the Times (Harry Styles song)|Sign of the Times]]".

Lemoine is also a [[chamber pop]] musician. On 28 March 2011, he released his first [[Extended play|EP]] ''Iron EP''. On 18 March 2013, he released his first album titled ''[[The Golden Age (Woodkid album)|The Golden Age]]'', which is an autobiographical record. He released his second album ''S16'' on 16 October 2020, more than seven years later, following some single releases. His [[Death Stranding 2: On the Beach#Music|third album]], a collaboration with [[Hideo Kojima]] for the 2025 videogame [[Death Stranding 2: On the Beach]], was released on 13 June 2025. He has also composed for the series [[Arcane (TV series)|Arcane]].
